references.paper_title: Sparse convex optimization via adaptively regularized hard thresholding
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical groundwork for understanding differentiable pruning techniques and their connection to sparse convex optimization, which forms the basis for the current work.

references.paper_title: AC/DC: alternating compressed/decompressed training of deep neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the ACDC algorithm, which is combined with the differentiable pruning methods in this paper to achieve state-of-the-art results.
This paper introduces the Sequential Attention algorithm, which is a key component of the proposed SequentialAttention++ algorithm.

references.paper_title: Reparameterizing mirror descent as gradient descent
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical insights into the relationship between mirror descent and gradient descent, which is relevant to the understanding of differentiable pruning techniques.

references.paper_title: Performance of l1 regularization for sparse convex optimization
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical analysis of group LASSO and its connection to differentiable pruning, which is crucial for the theoretical contributions of this work.
